analysis.description:
TokenCampaign.finalizeCampaign (/unique_chucks/6/0x32ec2e6967687825123c5c0f30c18e2c47708df1.sol#1220-1263) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- trusteeVaultAddr.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/6/0x32ec2e6967687825123c5c0f30c18e2c47708df1.sol#1239-1241)

Reentrancy in TokenCampaign.finalizeCampaign (/unique_chucks/6/0x32ec2e6967687825123c5c0f30c18e2c47708df1.sol#1220-1263):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(do_grant_tokens(bountyVaultAddr,bountyTokens)) (/unique_chucks/6/0x32ec2e6967687825123c5c0f30c18e2c47708df1.sol#1248-1250)
	- assert(bool)(do_grant_tokens(teamVaultAddr,teamTokens)) (/unique_chucks/6/0x32ec2e6967687825123c5c0f30c18e2c47708df1.sol#1257-1259)
	External calls sending eth:
	- trusteeVaultAddr.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/6/0x32ec2e6967687825123c5c0f30c18e2c47708df1.sol#1239-1241)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensGenerated (/unique_chucks/6/0x32ec2e6967687825123c5c0f30c18e2c47708df1.sol#1257-1259)

MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/6/0x32ec2e6967687825123c5c0f30c18e2c47708df1.sol#202) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/6/0x32ec2e6967687825123c5c0f30c18e2c47708df1.sol#299-336)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/6/0x32ec2e6967687825123c5c0f30c18e2c47708df1.sol#414-436)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x32ec2e6967687825123c5c0f30c18e2c47708df1.sol#530-544)
	- generate_token_for (/unique_chucks/6/0x32ec2e6967687825123c5c0f30c18e2c47708df1.sol#759-789)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/6/0x32ec2e6967687825123c5c0f30c18e2c47708df1.sol#607-615) is declared view but contains assembly code
